resources.string: Hello, my name is Markos Kapnakis. I made this simple button masher game for my assignment in mobile development at IEK Galatsiou

The rules are simple:

 	• Tapping the good bread gives you +1 points
 	• Tapping the evil bread gives you -1 points
 	• You have 1 minute to tap the good bread as many times as you can

This project ended up being far more complicated than it needed to be all things considered, but I wanted to have fun with ti and thought I should upload it on my GitHub. with all the source code and credits for the art I used
If you can\'t view this text, go the github repo
Click any of the breads to startâ€¦
